items.sentence: I sometimes feel drowsy in the early afternoon.
I sometimes hear my father singing in the bath.
I spent yesterday reading instead of going out.
I stayed home all day instead of going to work.
Tom must\'ve had a good reason for what he did.
Tom never said anything about where he\'d been.
Tom never should\'ve let Mary out of his sight.
Tom noticed the wedding ring on Mary\'s finger.
Is there anyone who doesn\'t have one of these?
Is this the first time you\'ve seen this movie?
